#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int min (int array[],int array_size){
    int min=INT_MAX;
     for(int count=0;count <array_size;count++)
    {
        if(count == 0){
            min= array[count];
        }else{
            if(array[count]<min){
                 min= array[count];
            }
        }
    }
    
    return min;
    
}

int max (int array[],int array_size){
    int max=INT_MIN;
     for(int count=0;count <array_size;count++)
    {
        if(count == 0){
            max= array[count];
        }else{
            if(array[count]>max){
                 max= array[count];
            }
        }
    }
    
    return max;
    
}

int main() {
    int array_size, number_query;
    
    cin>>array_size;
    cin>>number_query;
    
    int array[array_size];
    int query[number_query];
    
    for(int count=0;count <array_size;count++)
    {
        cin>>array[count];
    }
    
    
     for(int count=0;count <number_query;count++)
    {
        cin>>query[count];
    }
    
    int max_element,min_element;
    max_element=max(array,array_size);
    min_element=min(array,array_size);
    
     for(int count=0;count <number_query;count++)
    {
        if(min_element<=query[count]&&max_element>=query[count]&&query[count]>0)
          cout<<"Yes\n";
        else
          cout<<"No\n";
    }
    
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
